dancing_lights.name: Dancing Lights
dancing_lights.description: You create up to four lights that resemble lanterns or torches (and cast that amount of light), or up to four glowing spheres of light (which look like will-o'-wisps).

detect_magic.name: Detect Magic
detect_magic.description: You detect magical auras. The amount of information revealed depends on how long you study a particular area or subject.

ghost_sound.name: Ghost Sound
ghost_sound.description: You create a volume of sound that rises, recedes, approaches, or remains at a fixed place.

mage_hand.name: Mage Hand
mage_hand.description: You point your finger at an object and can lift it and move it at will from a distance.

telepathic_message.name: Telepathic Message
telepathic_message.description: You can mentally communicate with any other creature within range that has a language.

charm_person.name: Charm Person
charm_person.description: This charm makes a humanoid creature regard you as its trusted friend and ally.

command.name: Command
command.description: You give the subject a single command, which it obeys to the best of its ability at its earliest opportunity.

comprehend_languages.name: Comprehend Languages
comprehend_languages.description: You can understand the spoken words of creatures or read otherwise incomprehensible written messages.

detect_thoughts.name: Detect Thoughts
detect_thoughts.description: You detect surface thoughts. The amount of information revealed depends on how long you study a particular area or subject.

disguise_self.name: Disguise Self
disguise_self.description: You make yourself—including clothing, armor, weapons, and equipment—look different.

identify.name: Identify
identify.description: This spell functions as detect magic, except that it gives you a +10 enhancement bonus to Mysticism checks to identify the properties and command words of magic items in your possession.

magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
magic_missile.description: You fire two missiles of magical energy that strike their targets, dealing 1d4+1 force damage each.

mystic_cure.name: Mystic Cure
mystic_cure.description: You channel positive energy that cures 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier Hit Points of damage to the target.

augury.name: Augury
augury.description: An augury can tell you whether a particular action will bring good or bad results for you in the immediate future.

fog_cloud.name: Fog Cloud
fog_cloud.description: A bank of fog billows out from the point you designate. The fog obscures all sight, including darkvision, beyond 5 feet.

hold_person.name: Hold Person
hold_person.description: The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place. It is aware and breathes normally but cannot take any actions.

invisibility.name: Invisibility
invisibility.description: The creature or object touched becomes invisible, vanishing from sight, even from darkvision.

make_whole.name: Make Whole
make_whole.description: This spell functions as mending, except that it completely repairs an object made of any substance.

mirror_image.name: Mirror Image
mirror_image.description: Several illusory duplicates of you pop into being, making it difficult for enemies to know which target to attack.

clairaudience_clairvoyance.name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
clairaudience_clairvoyance.description: You create an invisible magical sensor at a specific location that enables you to hear or see (your choice) almost as if you were there.

dispel_magic.name: Dispel Magic
dispel_magic.description: You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing spell that has been cast on a creature or object.

explosive_blast.name: Explosive Blast
explosive_blast.description: You magically transform a piece of ammunition into an explosive projectile.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: A glowing, pea-sized bead streaks from your pointing digit and, unless it impacts upon a material body or solid barrier prior to attaining the prescribed range, blossoms into the fireball at that point.

haste.name: Haste
haste.description: The transmuted creature moves and acts more quickly than normal. This extra speed has several effects.

slow.name: Slow
slow.description: An affected creature moves and acts more slowly than normal. Slowed creatures can take only a single move action or standard action each turn.
